title: Number.isSafeInteger()
description: The `Number.isSafeInteger()` static JS method determines whether the provided value is a safe integer.
content: The static method that checks if a value is a safe integer, meaning itâ€™s an integer that can be exactly represented by JavaScript without rounding errors. Safe integers range from -(2^53 - 1) to 2^53 - 1.
